entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
